mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_ACCSPETRSDSPSGMT (ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO, CAGOFTRDNM, REPORTFLAG) values (#{AcctSpecTrstDspnSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CagOfTrdNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO, CAGOFTRDNM, REPORTFLAG,PARAGRAPHDEL from PBCRS_REPORT_ACCSPETRSDSPSGMT where ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO = #{AcctSpecTrstDspnSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO, CAGOFTRDNM, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_ACCSPETRSDSPSGMT

select count(1) from pbcrs_report_AccSpeTrsDspSgmt info1 join pbcrs_report_CagOfTrdInf info2 on info1.acctspectrstdspnsgmtseqno=info2.acctspectrstdspnsgmtseqno where info1.acctspectrstdspnsgmtseqno=#{AcctSpecTrstDspnSgmtSeqNo}
mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_ACCSPETRSDSPSGMTM (ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO, CAGOFTRDNM, REPORTFLAG, ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS) select ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO, CAGOFTRDNM, '0', ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS from PBCRS_REPORT_ACCSPETRSDSPSGMT where ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO = #{AcctSpecTrstDspnSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
